    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dogodek - vzrok</string>
            <string language="en">Event - cause</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fall - Ursache</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Événement - cause</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evento - causa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Evento - causa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεγονός - αιτία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acontecimiento - causa</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Reševalec mora razmisliti in si izmisliti možne vzroke določenega dogodka. Razvijamo kreativnost, sposobnost vzročnega mišljenja.</string>
            <string language="en">Using imagination to come up with possible cause to the given event/consequence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dogodek</string>
            <string language="en">event</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzrok</string>
            <string language="en">cause</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">domišljija</string>
            <string language="en">imagination</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phantasie verwenden, um mit möglicher Ursache 
zum gegebenen event/consequence oben zu kommen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation de l'imagination pour proposer la 
cause possible à l'event/consequence donné.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando a imaginação vir acima com causa 
possível ao event/consequence dado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando immaginazione per fornire causa possibile 
al dato event/consequence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τη φαντασία για να βρεί την πιθανή 
αιτία στο δεδομένες γεγονός/τη συνέπεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando la imaginación para venir para arriba con
causa posible al event/consequence dado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phantasie</string>
          </keyword>
